Localization.Help:
PhotoAlbumCreator — standalone photo album generator

Commands:
  init [--force]
      Create (or update when using --force) the System/ folder with scripts and styles.

  new
      Create a new album (will ask for the name interactively). Structure:
        <Album>/
          Files/
          index.html

  fill <PathToAlbum>
      Fill the album based on the files in <Album>/Files/.
      If tags already exist, will ask what to do (replace/skip/cancel).
      If System/ is missing — it will be added. If Files/ is missing — it will be created.

Examples:
  PhotoAlbumCreator init
  PhotoAlbumCreator init --force
  PhotoAlbumCreator new
  PhotoAlbumCreator fill
